name: Jesse Qin
title: Background
background: Hi! I'm Jesse! I'm a graduate student majoring in computer science at UCSD. I am currently a teaching assistant for a HCI course.
help: I am friends with many people from different majors and backgrounds. I can share some really cool stories from them, or I can share my own insights that I've learned from my four years at UCSD.
interests: I enjoy running, biking, and running 5k's. On my spare time, I usually got eat hot pot!
